price: O my two fellow prisoners, which is better: many different lords or Allah, the One, the Subjugator?
arabic: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
